name: Moon City (MoonCityMayor)
description:
Narrative RPG
No Ads! No Idle! No Paywall!
Just Passion

Moon City is a fresh look towards the stars and future of modern space travel. A fast paced yet spectacular play through.
Ambitious, hilarious, deep and politically satirical.

Moon City is a coherent and character prediction on the future of the Moon.(Happy Halloween 2021)
